com.github.robocup_atan.atan.model

Interface ActionsTrainer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SServerTrainer

    public interface ActionsTrainer
    Interface for an abstract ActionsTrainer. To be used by Controller.
    Author:
    Atan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      This is used to disconnect a trainer from the server.

    • Method Detail

      • changePlayMode

        void changePlayMode(PlayMode playMode)
        Changes the play mode of the current game.
        Parameters:
        playMode - a PlayMode object.

      • movePlayer

        void movePlayer(ActionsPlayer p,
              double x,
              double y)
        Moves the given player to the given location.
        Parameters:
        p - The player to move.
        x - The x coordinate.
        y - The y coordinate.

      • moveBall

        void moveBall(double x,
            double y)
        Moves the ball to the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate.
        y - The y coordinate.

      • checkBall

        void checkBall()
        Checks the current status of the ball.

      • startGame

        void startGame()
        Starts the game.

      • recover

        void recover()
        Recovers the players stamina, recovery, effort and hear capacity to the values at the beginning of the game.

      • eye

        void eye(boolean eyeOn)
        Turns on or off the sending of "(see_global ...)" information from the server.
        Parameters:
        eyeOn - True to turn (see_global on, false to turn it off.

      • ear

        void ear(boolean earOn)
        Turns on or off the sending of auditory information from the server.
        Parameters:
        earOn - True to turn auditory information on, false to turn it off.

      • say

        void say(String message)
        This command broadcasts the message throughout the field. Any player near enough (specified with audio_cut_dist default 50.0 meters), with enough hearing capacity will hear the message.
        Parameters:
        message - A valid String to say.

      • changePlayerType

        void changePlayerType(String teamName,
                    int unum,
                    int playerType)
        This command changes a specified players type. Each time a player is substituted by some other player type, its stamina, recovery and effort is reset to the initial (maximum) value of the respective player type.
        Parameters:
        teamName - The team the player belongs to.
        unum - The players uniform number (1~11 on pitch usually, subs <= 14).
        playerType - A player type between 0 (the standard player) and 18. However, player.conf can change this.

      • look

        void look()
        This command provides information about the positions of the following objects on the field. The left and right goals? (Do they move?) The ball. All active players. This is the same data as from (see_global, but it is only received when look in invoked.

      • teamNames

        void teamNames()
        This command provides information about the names of both teams and which side they are playing on.

      • bye

        void bye()
        This is used to disconnect a trainer from the server. The server will not respond.

      • handleError

        void handleError(String error)
        The method used to show errors.
        Parameters:
        error - The error to show.
